segments.text: I see a woman in a knee-length dress, completely absorbed in her task of drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense that she seems oblivious to the water spilling over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice that one of her feet is already in the growing puddle, but she remains unfazed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost like she’s in her own little world, where nothing else matters but that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sun is shining through the open window, casting a warm glow on the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks so inviting and calm, a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit anxious knowing the water is pooling right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR
